text:
Nature Society of Tirupur (NST), and NSS wing of Chikkanna Government Arts College celebrated the birth anniversary of Charles Darwin, the geologist who was best known for his contributions to evolution theory.

A special visual show on the life of Darwin was presented. NST president K. Ravindran explained the significance of Darwin's writings.

Painting and essay writing competitions were held for college students.
title: Darwin’s birth anniversary
